page.title: 07Health Care in Soham
page.content: { Medical and health care}in Soham is organised at the health centre.There are seven doctors there, serving and helping the residents of Soham.The doctors names are Drs. Dixie, Burton, Palmer, Pather, Baker, Frost and Taylor. There are four{nurses}in the health centre. There is only one{Dentist whose name is Mr.Frost.The biggest health problem in Soham at the moment is chicken pox. About 50 people have gone down with this in June 1985. There are 5 sheltered{old people's {homes}in Soham: Frankbridges, The Causeway, Hereward, Westdrive and Northfields. There are between 20 and 50 old people in each and they are looked after by a resident warden. Activities for the elderly include an over 60's club,a day centre ,keep fit, and meals on wheels.
